metadata.Title: CVE-2024-22195 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Jinja is an extensible templating engine. Special placeholders in thetemplate allow writing code similar to Python syntax. It is possible toinject arbitrary HTML attributes into the rendered HTML template,potentially leading to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). The Jinja `xmlattr`filter can be abused to inject arbitrary HTML attribute keys and values,bypassing the auto escaping mechanism and potentially leading to XSS. Itmay also be possible to bypass attribute validation checks if they areblacklist-based.

criterions.comment: jinja2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
